Module ZiqiYang
Package org.ziqi.gameEngine

Class Logger

java.lang.Object
java.util.logging.Logger
org.ziqi.gameEngine.Logger
public class Logger
extends java.util.logging.Logger
Logger class takes charge of logging different levels of console message for each GameManager.
Each type of GameManager will possess its own logger, and each logger will produce its own log file.
Author:
Ziqi Yang-modified
See Also:
GameManager

  • Constructor Details

    • Logger

      public Logger​(java.lang.String loggerName) throws java.io.IOException
      Logger constructor to generate log directory(if none exists) and its own log file for its attached GameManager.
      Parameters:
      loggerName - String value specifying the class name(GameManger name) the logger is attached to generate corresponding log file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - When a FileHandler cannot be initialized, IOException is thrown to GameManager to handle.

  • Method Details

    • createFormattedMessage

      private java.lang.String createFormattedMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Generates specific formatted log message by given message string and data format specified in m_DateFormat.
      Parameters:
      message - String value specifying the raw message to be logged.
      Returns:
      The formatted message string is returned with time when the message is created.
      See Also:
      m_DateFormat, Calendar
